description:
NTS Map: 083A05This trail circumnavigates the Riverbend Golf 
Course north of Red Deer. In winter, the 
trails are groomed for classic and skate cross 
country skiing. Dogs are restricted to the 
perimeter trail along the river and must be 
leashed.
directions:
take the first turn east of the Red Deer River 
turn north) when driving east. Follow this 
road a couple of km until you see the sign 
for Riverbend. Park near the clubhouse.
title: Riverbend
